chargeHist.descr: Identity Theft - Obtain Money or Credit

result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel G Robinson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Identity Theft - Obtain Money or Credit [Modifiers: as a Party to a Crime], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.203(2)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $500 cash bail applied to restitution. Agent to monitor payment plan set between Defendant and Credit Card company (12 monthly payments of $227).

*Amended 09/19/2019:
Defendant to maintain full time employment totaling at least 36 hours per week.

Submit to DNA analysis to be scheduled with Ozaukee County Sheriff's Office.

records.addlTxt: 11:32 AM All parties appearing by video/telephonic means. Defendant Daniel G Robinson in court.  Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Agent Greg Walkowiak also appears. Court provided update as to payments. Court directs the Department to request a review should it be necessary. If not paid in full by October, Agent to submit order extending probation one year.

Controller confirmed with DOC Cashier defendant has made the following payments since the last hearing:  3/25/2020  $250.00, 4/28/2020 $300.00 & 5/5/2020 $260.00, payments have also been made by co-defendant. Balance owed on joint & several restitution is $1,500.00.
Probation review hearing on May 29, 2020 at 11:30 am.

Pursuant to the Wisconsins Supreme Courts Order issued March 22, 2020, the May 29, 2020 hearing is being held via video and telephone conferencing.  You may join this hearing by video using the following website: https://zoom.us/j/913 5945 0407 (meeting ID: /913 5945 0407) or you may join the hearing by phone by calling 1-312-626-6799 (meeting ID: /913 5945 0407).
Probation review hearing on May 29, 2020 at 11:30 am.
RESCHEDULED FROM 4/7/20 BY THE COURT
Probation review hearing on April 7, 2020 at 11:30 am.

11:33 AM Defendant Daniel G Robinson in court.  Benjamin Lindsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Agent Corey Walkowich in person.  Defendant advises the Court on progress since last hearing:  still searching for a second job and advises of places applied.  Defendant further indicates two payments made for a total of $250.  Agent indicates unaware of one of the payments.  Agent checks cell phone of co-defendant and confirms the second payment.  Court questions agent on whether a budget has been set with this defendant.  Agent confirms did not meet to review financials and set a budget, but have agreed to continue payments in amount of $250 each month.  Court orders matter adj for continued review on 4/7 at 11:30 am.
Controller confirms with DOC Cashier defendant has made payment of $209.00 since last hearing.

Defendant Daniel G Robinson in court with attorney Jamie Marie Mcclendon.  Jeffrey A Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 2:12pm Case recalled. Defendant Daniel G Robinson in court with attorney Jamie Marie Mcclendon.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Plea questionaire filed. Court examines defendant, accepts change of plea and finds defendant guilty. State recommends: Withheld sentence, 3 years probation, Restitution ordered joint/several with co-defendant. Court removes Jury trial date from court calendar. Court advises defendant that he remains under bail conditions until sentencing.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for August 15, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
